title: Leigh Compton is new Danville finance director - The Advocate-Messenger - Danville Advocate
content: Leigh Compton is new Danville finance director - The Advocate-Messenger  Danville Advocate
description: The city of Danville has hired a new Finance Director, Leigh Compton. Compton has worked in audit roles for Forcht Bank, NA in Lexington, The Kentucky Auditor of Public Accounts, and the Kentucky Transportation Cabinet. A native of the Danville area and a graduate of the Boyle County school system, Compton wanted to come back [â€¦]
